Frontend Developer

StartupXYZ

Remote (US)

About Us

StartupXYZ is building the future of e-commerce. We're a small, scrappy team looking for passionate developers to help us grow.

The Role

We need a Frontend Developer who loves building beautiful, responsive user interfaces. You'll work with our design team to bring mockups to life and create delightful user experiences.

What You'll Do

  • Build responsive web applications using React and TypeScript
  • Collaborate with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
  • Optimize applications for performance and accessibility
  • Participate in code reviews and team discussions

Requirements

  • 2+ years of frontend development experience
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript
  • Experience with React or similar frameworks
  • Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and responsive design
  • Familiarity with Git and version control

Bonus Points

  • Experience with Next.js
  • Knowledge of GraphQL
  • Eye for design and UX
